casebody.data:
NATIONAL LABOR RELATIONS BOARD, Petitioner, v. C. E. SAWYER, d/b/a Sawyer Sheet Metal Fabricators, Respondent. No. 14680. United States Court of Appeals Fifth Circuit. Nov. 4, 1953. A. Norman Somers, Asst. Gen. Coun.sel, N.L.R.B., David P. Findling, Assoc, Gen. Counsel, Washington, D. C., Frank E. Hamilton, Jr., Atty. N.L.R.B., At-tanta, Ga., George J. Bott, Gen. Counsel, Marcel Mallet-Prevost, Robert E. Mil]er, Attorneys, National Labor Relations Board, Washington, D. C., for petitioner Maurice F. Bishop, Birmingham, Ala., for respondent.

Before HOLMES and RIVES, Circuit Judges, and KENNAMER, District Judge.

PEE CUEI AM.

It is ordered that the petition for the enforcement of the order of the Board jn case be, and the same hereby is, granted.

Enforcement ordered.
